name: A Day At The Pond
description:
Play as Emma in this little Point-and-Click-Adventure to discover a mystery at her Grandmother's House.

This game is made during the Gamedev.js Jam 2021 with Unity WebGL. This is my very first game I  developed by myself ♥

Small disclaimer: this is a prototype and there is a bit more story to come! (two additional scenes and puzzles)

Controls

- Moving: Arrow-Keys or ASWD

- Interacting:  Mouseclick

Credits

Art and Programming: Me

Sounds: freesound.com - "Summer Meadow" by barryy. Licensed under Creative Commons 0 License. "Frog Croaking (UK Common Frog)" by shaunhillyard. Licensed under Creative Commons 0 License. "2020 forest NL » forest summer Roond 022 200619_0186.wav" by klankbeeld. Licensed under Attribution License.
